description: A versatile template for generating datasets, including text, intent, sentiment, tone, category, and keywords.

fields.name: text
fields.description: A meaningful sentence or statement relevant to the context.

fields.name: intent
fields.description: The primary goal or purpose of the text, such as 'information_request' or 'celebration'.

fields.name: sentiment
fields.description: The overall emotional tone, e.g., 'positive', 'neutral', or 'negative'.

fields.name: sentiment_polarity
fields.description: A numerical value between -1.0 (strongly negative) and 1.0 (strongly positive).

fields.name: tone
fields.description: The way the message is delivered, such as 'friendly', 'inquisitive', or 'urgent'.

fields.name: category
fields.description: The domain or subject area, e.g., 'technology', 'food', or 'personal'.

fields.name: keywords
fields.description: Key phrases or terms that summarize the entry's topic, separated by spaces.

examples.text: Can you draw a mountain landscape?

metadata.description: Custom template for flexible dataset generation and structure validation.
